DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Vaginal change may effect sexual function occur patient undergo treatment cervical cancer . PURPOSE : Clinical trial determine type vaginal change vaginal dryness occur patient receive treatment cervical cancer effect change sexual function .
DOC.brief_title: Vaginal Changes Sexual Function Patients With Cervical Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Obtain estimate change vaginal length , perceive vaginal elasticity , perceive vaginal lubrication , sexual activity , response , satisfaction among patient stage IB2 cervical cancer . - Compare difference patient two treatment group GOG-0201 . - Determine relationship vaginal dilation activity vaginal length change patient . - Determine association smoke vaginal length smoke vaginal dryness patient therapy cervical cancer . - Assess extent subject interest prefer method sexual counseling relate problem result treatment patient . OUTLINE : Vaginal length measure use Vaginal Sound , modify plastic vaginal dilator . The data vaginal elasticity lubrication sexual activity , response , satisfaction obtain patient self-report , well vaginal dilation activity . Measurement assessments take treatment 3 , 6 , 12 , 24 month . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 150 patient accrue study .
